description: AirFox’s vision is to make the mobile internet more affordable and accessible and the biggest limitation for our customers is access to capital. AirFox is positioned to create mobile capital for advertisers, users, and carriers using the blockchain. AirFox uses advertising and micro-loans on the blockchain to unlock unrealized mobile capital through a new cryptocurrency - The AirToken (“AIR”). AIR technology harnesses the decentralized power of the Ethereum blockchain using a digital ledger of the user’s mobile phone data as well as advertising and proprietary “credit-score” algorithms to reward​ ​and finance​ ​users with AIR. AIR are redeemable for mobile data, and, eventually, physical and digital goods. AIR monetizes the user’s smartphone by rewarding and financing the user for attention and good behavior while expanding the pie for the entire ecosystem that wants to further maximize on this audience (carriers, publishers, and advertisers).
name: AirToken
